Texts.Eng: Ah, so Hadaeko sent you? She's right, I know how to open those ancient relics. Here you go: a small Xanafian Shard.

I can't extract the Shard from this relic myself, but Barnos has picked up a few tricks over the years. Collecting exotic weapons requires you to delve into ancient ruins, it seems. ^green;Bring the ^orange;Centensian Relic ^green;to ^orange;Barnos^green; at the shooting range^reset;, and he can extract the Shard for you.
